mapper.select: -- UsrDao.selectUsrList SELECT USR_ID ,USR_EMAIL ,USR_PW ,USR_NM ,USR_AGE ,USE_YN ,date_format(REG_DT,'%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%S') AS REG_DT ,REG_USR_ID ,date_format(UPD_DT,'%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%S') AS UPD_DT ,UPD_USR_ID FROM TSYUR00010 WHERE 1=1 AND ( (#{searchKeyCombo} = 'USR_ID' AND USR_ID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{searchValue}),'%')) OR (#{searchKeyCombo} = 'USR_NM' AND USR_NM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{searchValue}),'%')) ) ORDER BY USR_ID
-- UsrDao.selectUsrCnt SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM TSYUR00010 WHERE USR_ID = #{USR_ID}
mapper.delete: -- UsrDao.deleteUsr DELETE FROM STTL.TSYUR00010 WHERE USR_ID = #{USR_ID}
mapper.update: -- UsrDao.updateUsr UPDATE STTL.TSYUR00010 SET USR_ID = #{USR_ID} ,USR_EMAIL = #{USR_EMAIL} ,USR_PW = #{USR_PW} ,USR_NM = #{USR_NM} ,USR_AGE = CAST(#{USR_AGE} AS INT) ,USE_YN = CASE WHEN #{USE_YN} = 'true' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END ,UPD_DT = curdate() ,UPD_USR_ID = #{UPD_USR_ID} WHERE USR_ID = #{USR_ID}
